tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sim_card_data (
  sim_card_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mobile_number VARCHAR(12),
  data_plan VARCHAR(50),
  data_usage FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sim_cards (
  sim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  phone_number VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  country_code VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL,
  data_limit INT
)

CREATE TABLE data_plans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plan_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  data_amount INT NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE sim_card_data_plans (
  sim_id INT,
  plan_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (sim_id, plan_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (sim_id) REFERENCES sim_cards(sim_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (plan_id) REFERENCES data_plans(plan_id)
)

CREATE TABLE sim_ownership (
    ownership_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sim_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (sim_id) REFERENCES sim_cards(sim_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sim_id UUID,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    amount DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (sim_id) REFERENCES sim_cards(sim_id)
);
